results.title: Metformin improves CD8+ T cell responses and parasitemia control via macrophage modulation during Trypanosoma cruzi infection.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ improves CD8+ T cell responses and @DISEASE_Parasitemia @DISEASE_MESH:D018512 @@@parasitemia@@@ control via macrophage modulation during @<m>DISEASE_Chagas_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014355 @@@Trypanosoma cruzi infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Baigorri RE, Brugo MB, Hellriegel F, Viano ME, Mazzocco YL, Ana Y, Fontanari C, Vazquez-Vignale M, Aoki MP, Rodriguez-Galán MC, Motrán CC, Stempin CC, Cerbán FM. Metformin improves CD8+ T cell responses and parasitemia control via macrophage modulation during Trypanosoma cruzi infection. J Leukoc Biol. 2025 Sep 26;():. PMID: 41002117

results.title: Resveratrol Reverses Functional Chagas Heart Disease in Mice
results.text_hl: Treatment with @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, an AMPK activator (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@), or a ROS scavenger (@CHEMICAL_tempol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C001803 @@@tempol@@@) were capable of ameliorating cardiac function in @<m>DISEASE_Chagas_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014355 @@@Chagas disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Vilar-Pereira G, Carneiro VC, Mata-Santos H, Vicentino AR, Ramos IP, Giarola NL, Feijó DF, Meyer-Fernandes JR, Paula-Neto HA, Medei E, Bozza MT, Lannes-Vieira J, Paiva CN. Resveratrol Reverses Functional Chagas Heart Disease in Mice PLoS Pathog. 2016 Oct;12(10):e1005947. PMID: 27788262
